author: MiniWarGaming
description:
All the best parts of The Depths of Perdition — shown in just 60 seconds.
If you want the full breakdown, early access, and launch-day bonuses, join the list at MiniWarGaming.com/Perdition.

The Depths of Perdition is our fully modular, cinematic sci-fi interior terrain system built around precision-engineered 6” tiles. Every corridor, room, and intersection snaps together magnetically, stays aligned during gameplay, and can be rearranged into entirely new layouts in minutes. Whether you’re exploring starships, bunker complexes, research labs, or industrial underhives, every map feels like a real, atmospheric location with endless replayability.

The entire set is optimized for real gamers and real 3D printers — support-free sculpts, hundreds of tile variations, removable doors, multi-level bunker pieces, and detailed scatter terrain to fill every room with character. You can print it on even a small-bed machine for surprisingly low cost, or choose a physical pledge if you prefer it p
title: All the Best Parts of Depths of Perdition in 60 Seconds
